motivation.title: Why Regular Exercise Matters?

point2.text: - 10 minutes daily, dramatic results in 3 months

motivation.premiumNote: With Premium: Unlock all {{count}} exercises, track progress with charts

tip.title: Tip:
tip.text: It's recommended to do exercises twice daily, morning and evening. Each session takes only 5-10 minutes.

completion.title: Congratulations!
completion.messagePremium: You've completed all of today's exercises. See you tomorrow!
completion.messageFree: You've completed the free exercise! Unlock all exercises with Premium.

detail.subtitle: {{region}}
detail.dailyRecommendation: It's recommended to do this exercise <bold>{{reps}}</bold> per day.
detail.premiumOnly: This exercise is for Premium members only
detail.alreadyCompleted: You've already completed this exercise today. Try again tomorrow!

research.title: Scientific Research
research.text: In a study published in JAMA Dermatology in 2018, it was observed that facial exercises increased facial fullness. These exercises are based on similar principles of increasing muscle tone and skin fullness.

recommended.title: Recommended Practice
recommended.point1: 30 minutes daily, 5-6 days per week of regular practice
recommended.point2: Be careful not to pull or wrinkle the skin excessively
recommended.point3: Always focus on moving the muscles, not the skin
recommended.point4: Regular and consistent practice is essential

warning.title: ⚠️ Important Warning
warning.text: These exercises and information do not replace medical advice or treatment. Research results do not guarantee individual experiences. Results vary from person to person. A doctor or specialist should be consulted for any health or aesthetic decisions. These exercises are for general muscle awareness and entertainment purposes.
